text: Guido Altarelli (July 12, 1941 - September 30, 2015) was an Italian theoretical physicist. He was born in Rome, Italy. He held positions at New York University (1968–69), the Rockefeller University (New York, 1969–70), l' École Normale Supérieure in Paris (76-77, 81), and Boston University (85-86). ==Awards== * Member of the Polish Academy of Sciences * 2011 Julius Wess Award for Outstanding Achievements in Elementary Particle and Astroparticle Physics - The Karlsruhe Institute of Technology * 2012 J. J. Sakurai Prize for Theoretical Particle Physics - The American Physical Society * High Energy and Particle Physics Prize - EPS HEPP Prize, 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== *Scientific publications of Guido Altarelli on INSPIRE-HEP Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian physicists Category:People from Rome
title: Guido Altarelli
